languages.text: {n}Смех Пощады, бархатный и располагающий, заставляет брови Джай страдальчески изломиться.{/n} "Ты хорошо слушала, шерин. Попав под обвинение, обвини сама — логичный шаг".

{n}Mercy's laughter, velvety and appealing, causes Jae's brow to furrow in torment.{/n} "You listened well, shereen. You found yourself accused, and so you cast an accusation in return — a logical move."
languages.original_text: {n}Смех Пощады, бархатный и располагающий, заставляет брови Джай страдальчески изломиться.{/n} "Ты хорошо слушала, шерин. Попав под обвинение, обвини сама — логичный шаг".

languages.text: {n}悯慈大笑起来，声音仿佛天鹅绒一样动人，但婕伊却痛苦地皱起了眉。{/n}“你真是个好学生，亲爱的。你发现别人在指控你，于是你也提出了指控，这确实是合乎逻辑的做法。”
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy's laughter, velvety and appealing, causes Jae's brow to furrow in torment.{/n} "You listened well, shereen. You found yourself accused, and so you cast an accusation in return — a logical move."

traits.locale_text: {n}悯慈大笑起来，声音仿佛天鹅绒一样动人，但婕伊却痛苦地皱起了眉。{/n}“你真是个好学生，亲爱的。你发现别人在指控你，于是你也提出了指控，这确实是合乎逻辑的做法。”
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}マーシーの滑らかな笑い声に、ジェイは眉をひそめた。{/n}「よく聞いていたな、シャリーン。お前は自分が非難されていることに気づき、お返しに非難を投げかけた…論理的な行動だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy's laughter, velvety and appealing, causes Jae's brow to furrow in torment.{/n} "You listened well, shereen. You found yourself accused, and so you cast an accusation in return — a logical move."

traits.locale_text: {n}マーシーの滑らかな笑い声に、ジェイは眉をひそめた。{/n}「よく聞いていたな、シャリーン。お前は自分が非難されていることに気づき、お返しに非難を投げかけた…論理的な行動だ」
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}La risa de Mercy, aterciopelada y seductora, hace que Jae frunza el ceño.{/n} «Has sido una buena alumna, shereen. Cuando te acusan, lanzas tu propia acusación como respuesta. Es la acción lógica».
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy's laughter, velvety and appealing, causes Jae's brow to furrow in torment.{/n} "You listened well, shereen. You found yourself accused, and so you cast an accusation in return — a logical move."

traits.locale_text: {n}La risa de Mercy, aterciopelada y seductora, hace que Jae frunza el ceño.{/n} «Has sido una buena alumna, shereen. Cuando te acusan, lanzas tu propia acusación como respuesta. Es la acción lógica».
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Jae fronce les sourcils d'inquiétude en entendant le rire velouté de Mercy.{/n} « Tu as bien retenu mes leçons, shereen. Tu te retrouves sur le banc des accusés et tu lances une accusation en retour... C'est logique. »
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy's laughter, velvety and appealing, causes Jae's brow to furrow in torment.{/n} "You listened well, shereen. You found yourself accused, and so you cast an accusation in return — a logical move."

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae fronce les sourcils d'inquiétude en entendant le rire velouté de Mercy.{/n} « Tu as bien retenu mes leçons, shereen. Tu te retrouves sur le banc des accusés et tu lances une accusation en retour... C'est logique. »
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Mercys samtiges und reizvolles Gelächter sorgt dafür, dass Jae vor lauter Qual die Stirn in Falten legt.{/n} "Ihr habt gut zugehört, Shereen. Ihr werdet beschuldigt, also beschuldigt Ihr zurück – ein logischer Schritt."
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy's laughter, velvety and appealing, causes Jae's brow to furrow in torment.{/n} "You listened well, shereen. You found yourself accused, and so you cast an accusation in return — a logical move."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mercys samtiges und reizvolles Gelächter sorgt dafür, dass Jae vor lauter Qual die Stirn in Falten legt.{/n} "Ihr habt gut zugehört, Shereen. Ihr werdet beschuldigt, also beschuldigt Ihr zurück – ein logischer Schritt."
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: {n}Merhamet'in pürüzsüz ve çekici kahkahası, Jae'ın kaşlarının acıyla çatılmasına sebep oluyor.{/n} "Dersini iyi öğrenmişsin şirinim. Kendini suçlanır hâlde buluyorsun ve suçlamayı karşı tarafa yansıtıyorsun. Mantıklı bir hareket."
languages.original_text: {n}Mercy's laughter, velvety and appealing, causes Jae's brow to furrow in torment.{/n} "You listened well, shereen. You found yourself accused, and so you cast an accusation in return — a logical move."

traits.locale_text: {n}Merhamet'in pürüzsüz ve çekici kahkahası, Jae'ın kaşlarının acıyla çatılmasına sebep oluyor.{/n} "Dersini iyi öğrenmişsin şirinim. Kendini suçlanır hâlde buluyorsun ve suçlamayı karşı tarafa yansıtıyorsun. Mantıklı bir hareket."
traits.speaker: Mercy
